name: 薛文景
objective: 瞭解熱力學在材料科學與工程應用上之重要性將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡。
schedule:
教材大綱 1.First law of themodynamics
2.Potential energy
3. Kinetics energy
4.Internal energy and Enthalpy
5.Second law of termodynamics
6.Ideal gas and 1.st law of thermodynamics
7. Ideal gas and 2.law of thermodynamics
8. Cannot cycle
9.Gibb free energy
10.Application of engineering thernodynamics
scorePolicy:
Lecture attentance and Oral report :40%
Quize test:20%
Team work:20%
Written Report:20%
materials:
教科書名 熱力學  作者 Octave Levenspier 
出版書局 高力立圖書  出版日期 西元1996
